uk.ac.gla.abbi.abbi_library.gatt_communication

Class AudioContinuous

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.gla.abbi.abbi_library.gatt_communication.AudioContinuous

  • public class AudioContinuous
extends java.lang.Object
    This class establishes an object structure to be used to encapsulate the continuous sound parameters. AudioContinuous's constructors: - transform a byte[] to pitch and frequency and store them - or directly create an AudioContinuous object from two integers (corresponding to pitch and volume)
